value.name: Hello future | Hedera
value.snippet: Hedera is a decentralized, open-source, proof-of-stake public ledger that utilizes the leaderless, asynchronous Byzantine Fault Tolerance (aBFT) hashgraph consensus algorithm. It is governed by a collusion-resistant, decentralized council of leading enterprises, universities, and web3 projects from around the world.

deepLinks.name: Open Source at Hedera
deepLinks.snippet: The Hedera Governing Council is committed to open, transparent code. Hedera platform and services code, as well as developer tools, are all open source (Apache 2.0 license). Hedera. Network. Network Services; Token Service. Mint and configure tokens and accounts. Consensus Service.

deepLinks.name: Wallets and Exchanges
deepLinks.snippet: Read the latest news, updates, and more from the Hedera blog. Media. Watch webinars, livestream replays, and more videos. Papers. Read technical and economic papers by Hedera. Press. Read featured Hedera press. Start. Back to ecosystem Exchanges & OTCs.

deepLinks.name: Network Status
deepLinks.snippet: This is the network status page for the Hedera mainnet (beta) entire network, Hedera mainnet (beta) individual nodes, testnet, and mirror node APIs. While in beta, the network may experience very brief periods of scheduled downtime for maintenance, which are excluded from uptime calculations.

deepLinks.name: Careers
deepLinks.snippet: The Hedera team is living on the cutting-edge of a new and exciting industry — we think about and build products every day for tomorrow’s future. Transparent. We hold ourselves accountable both internally and externally. If mistakes are made, we detail what happened, learn from them, and grow.

value.name: What is Hedera? | Hedera
value.snippet: Hedera is a fully open source public distributed ledger that utilizes the fast, fair, and secure hashgraph consensus. Its network services include Solidity-based smart contracts, as well as native tokenization and consensus services used to build decentralized applications. Hedera hashgraph Learning center.

value.name: Vedbend og efeu | Komplet guide til beskæring af hedera helix
value.snippet: Vedbend, Hedera helix, holder haven smuk og grøn gennem alle fire årstider. Planten kan både bruges som bunddække og slyngplante, og den er hårdfør og stedsegrøn. Vedbend fås med mange forskellige typer og farver, men fælles for dem alle er, at de gror hurtigt og nemt slynger sig op ad hegn og mure.

value.name: Hedera price today, HBAR to USD live, marketcap and chart | CoinMarketCap
value.snippet: Hedera (HBAR) is the native cryptocurrency of Hedera Hashgraph, a platform that is positioned as an alternative to traditional blockchain technology and aims to excel in speed, efficiency and security.

value.name: Almindelig Vedbend (Hedera helix) - Naturbasen
value.snippet: Etymologi: Slægtsnavnet hedera er det gamle latinske navn for Vedbend. Artsnavnet helix er af græsk helisso="jeg snor mig" og hentyder til den snoede, bugtede vækst. Det danske slægtsnavn Vedbend betyder "træ-bånd" og hentyder til, at de klatrende skud kan omklamre træstammerne som snærende bånd.

value.name: Vedbend - Hedera - haveABC.dk
value.snippet: Hedera hibernica, irsk vedbend, er vildtvoksende i det sydvestlige Irland. Den har en hurtig vækst med kraftige, grønligbrune skud, besat med store stjernehår. Bladene er store, femlap­pede og hjerteformede med særlig stor midterlap; farven er mat mørkegrøn med lysere nerver.

value.name: Efeu - Vedbend - Hedera - pasning
value.snippet: Den almindelige efeu, Hedera helix, er en af de få planter, som vokser vildt i Europa og som dyrkes som stueplante. Den hører til Araliaceae·familien. Der kendes kun syv arter, hvoraf kun to dyrkes almindeligt som stueplante: Hedera helix i næsten ubegrænsede varieteter og H. canariensis, kanarisk efeu. Der kommer til stadighed nye ...

value.name: Hedera - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Hedera, commonly called ivy (plural ivies), is a genus of 12–15 species of evergreen climbing or ground-creeping woody plants in the family Araliaceae, native to western, central and southern Europe, Macaronesia, northwestern Africa and across central-southern Asia east to Japan and Taiwan.

value.name: Hedera - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Hedera of klimop is een geslacht van kruipende of klimmende, groenblijvende planten uit de klimopfamilie ( Araliaceae ). Het geslacht kent in de Lage Landen slechts één soort die in het wild voorkomt: klimop ( Hedera helix) De planten komen van nature voor op de Atlantische eilanden, in delen van Europa, in Noordwest- Afrika en via ...

value.name: HEDERA ヘデラ - TSUTAYA
value.snippet: hedera（ヘデラ）はtsutayaオリジナルの文具・雑貨ブランド。花に寄り添う「蔦」のように、あなたに寄り添い、日常の生活に彩りを添えるアイテムでありたい。
